results.title: Situation Report 5 Wayanad Landslide (Date: 26th August 2024 (Fri) Time: 14:00 PM (IST) - India | ReliefWeb
results.snippet:
India
 SITUATION UPDATE AND RESPONSE • A landslide happened on July 30, 2024, at 02:17 hours, near Mundakki, Chooralmala, Vellarimala Village in Meppadi Panchayat, Vythiri Taluk, Wayanad District, as a result of continuous heavy to extremely severe rains. About 700 homes and businesses have been buried under the debris.

results.title: Wayanad landslides Highlights: At least 123 killed, several feared missing; IMD issues red alert for Wayanad, neighbouring districts - The Hindu
results.snippet: To enjoy additional benefits CONNECT WITH US Updated  - July 31, 2024 11:12 am IST

results.title: wayanad floods: Latest News & Videos, Photos about wayanad floods  | The Economic Times - Page 1
results.snippet: Heavy rains hit several districts in Kerala on Friday, causing waterlogging and traffic disruptions. The India Meteorological Department issued an orange alert for Ernakulam, Idukki, Thrissur, Kozhikode, Wayanad, Kannur, and Kasaragod. Moderate rainfall with gusty winds up to 50 kmph was forecasted. Residents in vulnerable areas are advised to relocate for safety. Kerala is struggling to recover from catastrophic landslides, as CCTV footage showcased the destruction in Wayanad. Shops were damaged, animals were swept away, and extreme rainfall was recorded. The government is actively conducting relief operations, which include new educational facilities and financial aid for affected individuals. More than 200 people lost their lives in the tragedy. In late July, landslides in Wayanad prompted a unique rescue effort involving off-road drivers and their 4x4 vehicles. Niyas, from Kozhikode, and Nithin Udaykrishna, returning from a motorsport challenge, were among those who navigated challenging terrains to assist in rescue operations. Their modified vehicles proved crucial in these efforts. The rising adoption of all-wheel drive vehicles in India and off-road training schools highlight their importance in disaster recovery, despite legal challenges regarding vehicle modifications. Off-roaders are increasingly recognized for their valuable role during natural calamities.

report_links.title: Kerala braces for severe weather: IMD issues orange alert for seven districts amid heavy rain, flooding
CCTV visuals throw light on horrors of Wayanad landslide tragedy
Road less travelled: As Wayanad shows, India’s off-roading community is fast emerging as a bankable support base in disaster relief
IMD issues red alert for landslide-hit Wayanad; warns of flash floods
IMD warns of heavy rain in landslide-hit Wayanad
